channel.title: Application-level Conflict resolution on Never stop learning!
channel.description: Recent content in Application-level Conflict resolution on Never stop learning!

item.title: Dynamo Paper Review
item.description: Dynamo: Amazon’s Highly Available Key-value Store Buzzwords Highly decentralized, loosely coupled, service-oriented architecture Consistent Hashing virtual nodes Quorum-like technique R + W > N Decentralized replica synchronization protocol anti-entropy (replica synchronization) protocol a big word for synchronizing two replicas Merkle tree Object versioning syntactic reconciliation new versions subsume the previous version(s), and the system itself can determine the authoritative version semantic reconciliation the reconciliation in order to collapse multiple branches of data evolution back into one vector clock Gossip-based distributed failure detection and membership protocol
